title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: Classic book on pragmatic approaches to software development.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy & proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in rural Idaho and goes on to earn a PhD.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Epic science fiction novel set on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
description: How today's entrepreneurs use continuous innovation.

title: The Design of Everyday Things
author: Don Norman
description: A classic introduction to design and usability.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A science fiction novel about survival and ingenuity.
